name: Charles Rangel
alma_mater: New York University  (B.S.) ,  St. John's University School of Law  (LL.B.)
office: Member of the, U.S. House of Representatives, from New York's 15th district,  16th District (1983-1993), 19th District (1973-1983), 18th District (1971-1973)
order5: Chairman of the House Committee on Ways and Means
awards: Bronze Star (with valor device, Purple Heart
